links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..173
formula: a(n)=(n+1)*(4^n-binomial(2*n+1, n))/2; G.f.: x*c(x)/(1-4*x)^2, where c(x) = g.f. for Catalan numbers A000108; also convolution of A000346(n-1), n >= 0, where A000346(-1)=0, with A000302 (powers of 4). - _Wolfdieter Lang_Asymptotics: a(n) ~ 2^(2*n-1)*(n+1-sqrt(4*n/Pi)). - _Fung Lam_, Mar 28 2014Recurrence: (n-1)*n*a(n) = 2*(n-1)*(4*n+1)*a(n-1) - 8*n*(2*n-1)*a(n-2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 28 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Peter Winkler (pw(AT)bell-labs.com)
